wikipedia_page.main: Air Chief Marshal Sir Douglas Charles Lowe,  (14 March 1922 – 24 January 2018) was a Second World War pilot and a senior commander in the Royal Air Force (RAF) in the 1970s and early 1980s.

response: Doug or Douglas Lowe may refer to:
* Douglas Lowe (RAF officer) (1922–2018), World War II pilot and Royal Air Force commander
*3 March 1973 Air Marshal Sir Douglas Lowe

Brennan carved the crest for the Prince of Wales, Great Master of the Order of the Bath. Other crests created by Brennan for Knights of the Bath include those of Sir Douglas Lowe, Sir Neil Wheeler and Sir Anthony Griffin.Order of the Bath
